{{Lang|'''Pika'''|ja=ピカ|ja_rm=Pika}} is a [[Shiba]] located beside [[Yamaue]] and [[Tokunaga]] in front of [[Naganohara Fireworks]] in [[Inazuma City]], [[Inazuma]].

==Location==
<gallery>
Location Naganohara Fireworks.png|Pika's location
NPC Location Pika, Tokunaga & Yamaue Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Not much is known about Pika, but it seems to be well-acquainted with the duo comedians Yamaue and Tokunaga. Pika can be seen interacting with them by giving responses such as wiggling its tail upon being asked questions.

===Appearance===
Pika appears as an orange-white shiba with black eyes.
